mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into orochi_app (`name`, `desc`, cover_image_url, created_on, created_by, update_on, update_by) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coverImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdOn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateOn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update orochi_app set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cover_image_url = #{coverImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_on = #{createdOn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_on = #{updateOn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, `desc`, cover_image_url, created_on, created_by, update_on, update_by from orochi_app
